hero.name: Cloak
hero.specialAbility: UMBRAAfter you attack, if Cloak dealt at least 2 combat damage, your opponent discards 1 card.REFRACTIONAfter you attack, if Dagger dealt at least 2 combat damage, gain 1 action.

cards.title: Channel the Dark
cards.basicText: After combat: If Cloak played this card, place the opposing fighter adjacent to Dagger and gain 1 action.

cards.title: Chosen Fate
cards.basicText: Deal up to 4 damage to one of your fighters. Your other fighter recovers that amount of health.%Draw 2 cards

cards.title: Darkforce Dimension
cards.basicText: After combat: Place the opposing fighter in any space. Your opponent discards 1 card.

cards.title: Into Darkness
cards.basicText: After combat: Choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 3 spaces.

cards.title: Lightforce Barrage
cards.basicText: After combat: If you won the combat, your fighter takes damage equal to the amount of damage you dealt.

cards.title: Living Shadow
cards.duringText: If Dagger played this card, she swaps spaces with Cloak, Cloak is now the defender, and the value of this card is 4 instead.

cards.title: Perfect Balance
cards.duringText: If Cloak and Dagger are both adjacent to the opposing fighter, the value of this card is 6 instead.

cards.title: The Living Light
cards.basicText: After combat: If Cloak played this to defend, Dagger recovers 2 health. If Dagger played this to attack, Cloak recovers 2 health.

cards.title: Traverse the Darkforce
cards.basicText: After combat: Move each of your fighters up to 2 spaces.

cards.title: Feint
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
